Anduro wallet supports a multi-sidechain network on Bitcoin built to revolutionize the future of blockchain innovation and sustain the long-term incentives of Bitcoin.

- Allow wallet users to send or receive btc
- Allow wallet users to send or receive cbtc
- Users can create their own trading assets such as NFTs, Tokens
